@MeAndTheBoy: It's more in-story than anything else. The guy tells Kagerou that the girl she saw him with is his sister. But then the girl calls Reimu and tells her "look at what that youkai is doing to my boyfriend/lover!". That's why Kagerou is pulling his mouth open while saying "hey, why is your 'sister' saying something so strange?".
